item.title: 中国敦促地方政府发放新年现金
item.description: 新华社援引民政部的通知报道称，中国中央政府敦促地方政府向生活困难的民众发放救济金。【原文：China’s central government urged local authorities to offer handouts to people struggling with the cost of living, Xinhua News Agency reported, citing a notice from the Ministry of Civil Affairs.】

item.title: 霍尔茨曼告诉 Kurier，欧洲央行在下一次降息前可能会酝酿等待
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员罗伯特-霍尔兹曼（Robert Holzmann）表示，如果能源价格带来的通胀风险或欧元贬值加剧成为现实，欧洲中央银行可能会考虑在下一次降息之前等待更长的时间。【原文：The European Central Bank could consider waiting longer before its next rate cut if inflation risks from energy prices or a stronger depreciation of the euro materialize, according to Governing Council member Robert Holzmann.】

item.title: 乌克兰-俄罗斯天然气过境协议面临关键时刻
item.description: 乌克兰天然气过境的未来正处于转折点。如果不能在周三前达成最后一刻的协议，数十亿立方米的天然气运输可能会停止。【原文：The future of gas transit through Ukraine is at a turning point. If a last-minute deal isn’t struck by Wednesday, billions of cubic meters in gas flows could come to a halt.】

item.title: 新加坡石油大亨在帝国崩溃后宣布破产
item.description: 新加坡前大亨 Lim Oon Kuin 在其石油贸易帝国崩溃后被宣布破产。【原文：Former tycoon Lim Oon Kuin has been declared bankrupt in Singapore, following the collapse of his oil trading empire.】

item.title: 蓝色起源公司在首次发射前点燃新火箭引擎
item.description: 杰夫-贝索斯（Jeff Bezos）的航空航天公司蓝色起源（Blue Origin）周五启动了其新型巨型火箭 "新格伦"（New Glenn）的发动机；这是最后一次关键测试，为火箭首次发射进入太空铺平了道路。【原文：Jeff Bezos’ aerospace firm Blue Origin fired up the engines on its massive new rocket, the New Glenn, on Friday — a last critical test needed to pave the way for the vehicle’s debut launch to space.】

item.title: 动量交易创纪录的一年即将结束，裂痕不断扩大
item.description: 尽管特朗普贸易得意洋洋，对人工智能歇斯底里，但在整个市场上赚钱却是艰难的一年。现在，就连推动美股上涨的贸易也开始出现动摇迹象。【原文：For all the Trump Trade triumphalism and hysteria for AI, it’s been a tough year to make money across markets. Now even the trade that powered US stocks is starting to show signs of wavering.】

item.title: 耶伦称财政部将在一月中旬达到新的债务限额
item.description: 美国财政部长珍妮特-耶伦（Janet Yellen）表示，美国财政部很可能在 1 月中旬的某个时候开始采取特殊的会计手段，以避免突破美国的债务限额，并敦促立法者采取行动捍卫美国的 "完全诚信和信用"。【原文：Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen said her department is likely to begin taking special accounting maneuvers sometime in mid-January to avoid breaching the US debt limit, and urged lawmakers to take action defending the “full faith and credit” of the US.】

item.title: 特朗普请求最高法院暂停威胁禁止 TikTok 的法律
item.description: 美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）要求美国最高法院暂停执行一项法律，该法律规定，如果中国母公司不出售 TikTok 社交媒体平台，将于 1 月 19 日禁用该平台。【原文：President-elect Donald Trump asked the US Supreme Court to pause a law that would ban the TikTok social media platform on Jan. 19 if it isn’t sold by its Chinese parent company.】

item.title: TikTok 和拜登政府就美国禁令在最高法院发生争执
item.description: TikTok 和拜登政府就一项法律向美国最高法院摊牌，双方针锋相对，该法律将在下个月禁止这一流行的社交媒体应用程序，除非其中国母公司将其出售。【原文：TikTok and the Biden administration made dueling arguments to the US Supreme Court in their showdown over a law that would ban the popular social media app next month unless it’s sold by its Chinese parent company.】

item.title: 阿根廷本周因进口国美元需求支出 8.03 亿美元
item.description: 阿根廷央行本周出售了约 8.03 亿美元的硬通货储备，因为官员们急于满足进口商在一次重大债券支付之前对美元的激增需求。【原文：Argentina’s central bank sold some $803 million in hard-currency reserves this week after officials rushed to meet a surge in demand from importers for dollars ahead of a major bond payment.】

item.title: 拉皮丹称中东原油流动风险正在上升
item.description: 拉皮丹能源集团（Rapidan Energy Group）总裁鲍勃-麦克纳利（Bob McNally）说，人们越来越担心，中东地区新的紧张局势有可能削减重要的能源资源。【原文：There’s increasing concern that fresh tensions in the Middle East threaten to curtail vital energy resources, said Bob McNally, president of Rapidan Energy Group.】

item.title: 塞内加尔力争到 2027 年将预算赤字降至十年来最低水平
item.description: 塞内加尔总理奥斯曼-松科（Ousmane Sonko）表示，随着塞内加尔从明年起开始削减政府开支并想方设法提高税收，塞内加尔计划到2027年将预算赤字降至国内生产总值的3%。【原文：Senegal plans to slash its budget deficit to 3% of gross domestic product by 2027 as it begins cutting government expenditure and finds ways to boost tax collections from next year, Prime Minister Ousmane Sonko said.】

item.title: 格鲁吉亚梦幻亿万富翁伊万尼什维利遭美国制裁
item.description: 美国财政部制裁了格鲁吉亚亿万富翁比季纳-伊万尼什维利，他是 "格鲁吉亚之梦 "的创始人。【原文：The US Treasury sanctioned Georgian billionaire Bidzina Ivanishvili, the founder of Georgian Dream, the political party that has turned away from the West in favor of closer ties with Russia.】

item.title: 索拉纳先锋被前妻起诉，索要数百万加密货币回报
item.description: 全球最大的区块链平台之一索拉纳（Solana）公司的一名联合创始人正与他的前妻就一批利润丰厚的 SOL 代币的收益打官司。【原文：A co-founder of Solana, one of the biggest blockchain platforms in the world, is locked in a legal battle with his former wife over the gains from a cache of lucrative SOL tokens.】

item.title: 2024 年最佳电子游戏
item.description:
从庞大的开放世界 RPG 到独立扑克流氓游戏，以下是我们今年最喜爱的游戏

。【原文：

From sprawling open-world RPGs to indie poker rogue-likes, here are our favorite games of the year

】

item.title: 巴拉圭央行行长认为 6% 的关键利率将抑制通胀
item.description: 巴拉圭央行主席卡洛斯-卡瓦略（Carlos Carvallo）在接受采访时说，巴拉圭央行认为，目前 6% 的基准利率将减缓物价上涨，最快在 2026 年年中达到新目标。【原文：Paraguay’s central bank sees its current benchmark interest rate of 6% slowing price increases to its new target as soon as the middle of 2026, Chairman Carlos Carvallo said in an interview.】

item.title: 策略师押注加拿大多伦多证券交易所明年将因利率下降而触及 28,000 点
item.description: 加拿大投资策略师预计，即使唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）即将上任的政府可能会对经济征收关税，加拿大主要股指明年仍将保持增长势头。【原文：Canadian investment strategists expect the country’s main stock index to keep up its momentum next year, even with possible tariffs from Donald Trump’s incoming administration hanging over the economy.】

item.title: 在债权人结束纷争后，Incora 将退出破产保护程序
item.description: 航空航天供应商 Incora 在宣布其最大的债权人同意支持重组后，赢得了法院的批准，而在此之前，该公司曾因一项臭名昭著的让贷款人相互对立的融资行为而争吵多年。【原文：Aerospace supplier Incora won court permission to exit bankruptcy after announcing that its top creditors have agreed to support a restructuring after years of acrimony over an infamous financing maneuver that pitted lenders against each other.】

item.title: 萨利纳斯将在旗舰企业 Elektra 股价暴跌后将其除名
item.description: 墨西哥亿万富翁里卡多-萨利纳斯-普利戈（Ricardo Salinas Pliego）多年来一直在努力捍卫其旗舰控股公司的股价，并经历了长达数月的停牌，如今他将把埃莱克特拉集团（Grupo Elektra）私有化。【原文：After years of fighting to defend the share price of his flagship holding and a months-long trading halt, Mexican billionaire Ricardo Salinas Pliego is taking Grupo Elektra private.】

item.title: 人工智能需要大量能源，导致美国数百万家庭用电失衡
item.description:
对美国城市和农村地区家庭数据的分析表明，靠近数据中心与高水平的电力失真之间存在密切联系。【原文：

Analysis of data from US homes in urban and rural areas shows a strong link between proximity to data centers and high levels of power distortions.

】

item.title: 比特币 "泡菜溢价 "在韩国政治动荡中飙升
item.description: 随着东亚国家政治动荡的加深，衡量韩国投资者对比特币兴趣的一个关键指标本周升至四个月高点。【原文：A key metric to gauge the interest in Bitcoin from investors in South Korea has risen this week to a four-month high, as the political turmoil in the East Asian country deepens.】

item.title: 90年代危机中的德国央行领导人赫尔穆特-施莱辛格逝世，享年100岁
item.description: 赫尔穆特-施莱辛格（Helmut Schlesinger）逝世，1990 年德国统一后，他作为德国联邦银行行长与通货膨胀和货币政策紧张局势作斗争。享年 100 岁。【原文：Helmut Schlesinger, who as president of Germany’s Bundesbank battled inflation and tensions over monetary policy following the reunification of his country in 1990, has died. He was 100.】

item.title: 当债券买方罢工成为问题时
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 过境协议结束后欧洲天然气公司面临重重挑战
item.description: 随着莫斯科和基辅之间的一项重要过境协议于12月31日到期，欧洲即将失去一大部分天然气供应。除非能在今年的最后几天做出替代安排，否则俄罗斯停止通过乌克兰输送天然气将给本已紧张的市场带来一系列挑战：【原文：Europe is about to lose a chunk of its gas supplies, with a key transit deal between Moscow and Kyiv expiring Dec. 31. Unless an alternative arrangement can be made in the final days of the year, the halt of Russian flows via Ukraine will present a slew of challenges to an already tight market:】

item.title: JSW 将以 15 亿美元收购淡马锡支持的清洁能源项目
item.description: 根据周五提交的一份证券交易所文件，印度 JSW 能源有限公司已同意以约 15 亿美元的全现金交易从 O2 Power Pooling Pte 收购清洁能源项目。【原文：India’s JSW Energy Ltd. has agreed to buy clean energy projects from O2 Power Pooling Pte for about $1.5 billion in an all-cash deal, according to a stock exchange filing Friday.】

item.title: 高利率消耗股市，巴西回购激增
item.description: 由于利率上升使拉丁美洲最大经济体的股票前景黯淡，巴西公司正以近二十年来最快的速度回购股票。【原文：Brazilian companies are buying back stocks at the fastest pace in almost two decades as higher interest rates sink the outlook for equities in Latin America’s largest economy.】

item.title: 中国与尼日利亚续签货币互换协议以促进双边贸易
item.description: 中国和尼日利亚续签了一项 150 亿元人民币（20 亿美元）的货币互换协议，旨在促进两国之间的贸易和投资。【原文：China and Nigeria have renewed a 15 billion yuan ($2 billion) currency-swap arrangement designed to boost trade and investment between the two countries.】

item.title: 法国-蒙古 16 亿美元铀矿项目将于 2028 年启动
item.description: 一个耗资 16 亿美元的法国-蒙古铀矿项目很可能在 2028 年开始投产，该项目在拖延数月后扫清了一个关键障碍。【原文：A $1.6 billion Franco-Mongolian uranium project will likely see production start in 2028, having cleared a key hurdle after months of delays.】

item.title: 习近平称中国面临 "艰巨 "的改革和稳定任务
item.description: 中国国家主席习近平表示，在 "顺利 "实现 2024 年经济和社会目标之后，中国明年面临的改革、发展和稳定任务 "十分艰巨"。【原文：Chinese President Xi Jinping said the nation faces “very arduous” reform, development and stability tasks next year, after having “smoothly” achieved economic and social targets for 2024.】

item.title: 期权市场看涨，兰特有望反弹
item.description: 期权市场的定位表明，南非兰特有望反弹，其幅度可能不亚于 12 月份的快速下跌。【原文：Positioning in the options market suggests South Africa’s rand is poised for a rebound that may be as steep as its rapid decline in December.】
